attributes.action: Give the people the EU referendum we want!
attributes.additional_details:
The people want the chance to choose whether to remain in the EU, or at the very least, have the terms of membership revised to something that would give OUR government sole control over OUR laws! No more EU Directives & Regulations, just plain British Laws.
Lose the whips present for the debate & voting on the 24/10/11 and then have the vote again!
